meanings.sent1: I saw many coleopterans crawling on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The coleopterans in the garden were colorful and fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The coleopterans had a party in the flower bed last night.
meanings.sent4: The coleopterans scurried around like tiny jewels in the grass.
meanings.sent5: The coleopterans buzzed softly as they explored the leaves.

meanings.definition: Coleopterans: belonging to the order Coleoptera
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied coleopterans to learn more about their classification.
meanings.sent2: Many coleopterans share similar characteristics due to their classification.
meanings.sent3: The coleopterans formed a club for insects with hard wing cases.
meanings.sent4: In the world of insects, coleopterans stand out for their unique order.
meanings.sent5: The coleopterans proudly displayed their Coleoptera membership badges.

meanings.definition: Coleopterans: insects with forewings modified into hard wing cases
meanings.sent1: The coleopterans' hard wing cases provided them protection in the wild.
meanings.sent2: Many coleopterans have evolved to have forewings transformed into wing cases.
meanings.sent3: The coleopterans organized a fashion show to showcase their wing cases.
meanings.sent4: The coleopterans' wing cases were like armored shields in battle.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the coleopterans' unique wing case designs.
